metadata.title: CVE-2019-10147 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: rkt through version 1.30.0 does not isolate processes in containers thatare run with `rkt enter`. Processes run with `rkt enter` are not limited bycgroups during stage 2 (the actual environment in which the applicationsrun). Compromised containers could exploit this flaw to access hostresources.

criterions.comment: rkt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
